sentences.en: But the mystique enjoyed by hedge - fund managers may not last for ever.
sentences.cn: 但是对冲基金经理身上神秘的光环也维持不了太久了.

sentences.en: But the mystique of science had not yet covered the earth.
sentences.cn: 但是科学的神秘性还未笼罩地球.

sentences.en: Call it " personality, " perhaps. Or maybe " mystique. "
sentences.cn: 称之为 “ 个性 ”,或许,也可以叫作 “ 独到性 ”.

sentences.en: Experience the natural aroma of Mystique.
sentences.cn: 体验这种神秘的自然香味.

sentences.en: He grew up working - class in Manhattan and was always drawn to the prep school mystique.
sentences.cn: 他成长于曼哈顿的 工人阶级,总是被预科神秘性所吸引.

sentences.en: HEDGE funds profit handsomely from their mystique.
sentences.cn: 对冲基金冠冕堂皇地利用他们的神秘性获取利润.

sentences.en: Horowitz, Daniel . Betty Friedan and the Making of the Feminine Mystique. 2000.
sentences.cn: 《贝蒂. 傅瑞丹和与女性迷思的造成》2000.

sentences.en: In a sense, the quasi - religious mystique of royalty came full circle with Diana.
sentences.cn: 就某种意义来说, 王室的半宗教神秘性填补了黛安娜的生活.

sentences.en: It also makes his brand distinctively conceptual and lends more mystique to his name.
sentences.cn: 这种风格让他的名字成为概念化的个性品牌,也让这个名字倍添神秘.

sentences.en: Its appeal as much on the mystique of its origins as its nutritional qualities.
sentences.cn: 牦牛具有神秘性的产地和营养价值使它充满魅力.

sentences.en: Some of the mystique surrounding the presidency has gone forever.
sentences.cn: 总统职位的某些神秘性已经永远消失了。

sentences.en: The mystique surrounding the monarchy has gone for ever.
sentences.cn: 王室的神秘性已经一去不复返。

sentences.en: There is a certain mystique about eating oysters.
sentences.cn: 人们对吃牡蛎有某种神秘感.

sentences.en: While dark - haired Bill exudes genteel values, Eric thrills with bad - boy mystique.
sentences.cn: 黑发的比尔散发出一种绅士风范, 艾瑞克则给人一种坏男孩的神秘感.

sentences.en: Yet whereas the mystique around such figures accumulates posthumously, he possesses it and lives.
sentences.cn: 然而, 他不仅拥有而围绕在逝者身上的那样神秘的魅力,同时他还是活着的.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的
神秘地；故弄玄虚地；难以理解地
神秘，秘密；奥秘；神秘的事物
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑

trans.tran_en: a quality that makes someone or something seem mysterious, exciting, or special
